Package org.newdawn.slick.tests

Tests for the facilities provided by the library.

See:
          Description

Class Summary

BigSpriteSheetTest A test for big images used as sprites sheets

Package org.newdawn.slick.tests Description

Tests for the facilities provided by the library.
